entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
